attributes.action: Prevent Leeds Metropolitan University from raising their £2000 fee's to £3000 effecting new and cureent students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds metropolitan University are planning to raise our fees! From the Current £2000 to £3000 in the next year, I was informed by a current student that when they were asked whether this move would effect current students they were not given a gurentee that it would not, and when they asked why the answer they received was because we can. PLease sign to try and prevent this move which will effect everyone!
